page.title: 07THE CARDIFF TIDAL YARD II
page.content: A COAL STOVE.THERE WERE ALSO 2 HOOKS TO GO OVER THE RAILWAY LINE IF THE TRAIN BROKE DOWN.A MESSAGE SIGNAL THEN GOES DOWN THE LINE AND THE SIGNALS BEHIND THE TRAIN CHANGE TO RED AND STOP ANY OTHER TRAIN CRASHING INTO IT FROM BEHIND.A RED PARAFFIN LAMP OF A COMPLETED TRAIN HANGS ON THE BACK OF THIS WAGGON.IT TOOK ABOUT FIVE OF US TO PULL THE LEVER TO CHANGE THE POINTS AND MAKE THE TRACK CHANGE DIRECTION INSIDE THE OFFICE WE SAW THE SLAVE COMPUTER WHICH PRINTED OUT A MESSAGE ABOUT THE TRAIN,ITS WAGGON NUMBERS, THEIR WEIGHT,CONTENTS AND DESTINATION. ON THE TELEPHONE CONNECTED PRINTER WE GOT A MESSAGE FROM RADYR.IT SAID 'GREETINGS TO THE CHILDREN OF TROWBRIDGE PRIMARY SCHOOL FROM RADYR T.O.P.S. OFFICE.'
